issue.title: [C++] Implement streaming RecordBatchReader for JSON
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17932](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17932). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We don't currently support incremental RecordBatch reading from JSON streams, which is needed to properly implement JSON support in Dataset. The existing CSV StreamingReader API can be used as a model.
